attributes.action: Tough sentences for those that broadcast child abuse on social networks
attributes.additional_details:
This is a petition to make sure those who broadcast child abuse on the internet via social networks, for example Twitter, recieve harsh Jail sentences.
Imagine this was your child, or your child is on the internet and comes across it. More needs to be done. You dont need to be a genius to know its wrong. Sign this and make a difference.
